.m-choosenews{position:relative}.m-choosenews__item-placeholder{pointer-events:none;margin-bottom:10px;padding-left:20px;padding-right:10px;content:"";display:block}.m-choosenews__item-placeholder--container{pointer-events:none;transition:opacity .2s;position:relative;width:100%}.loaded .m-choosenews__item-placeholder--container{opacity:0;z-index:-1;position:absolute}.m-choosenews__item-placeholder:after,.m-choosenews__item-placeholder:before{-webkit-animation-duration:1s;animation-duration:1s;-webkit-animation-fill-mode:forwards;animation-fill-mode:forwards;-webkit-animation-iteration-count:infinite;animation-iteration-count:infinite;-webkit-animation-name:placeHolderShimmer;animation-name:placeHolderShimmer;-webkit-animation-timing-function:linear;animation-timing-function:linear;background:#f6f7f8;background:linear-gradient(90deg,#eee 5%,#ddd 20%,#eee 35%);background-size:900px;pointer-events:none;content:"";display:block;border-radius:3px;margin-bottom:5px;height:15px;width:100%;position:relative}@-webkit-keyframes placeHolderShimmer{0%{background-position:-900px}to{background-position:900px}}.m-choosenews__item-placeholder:after{width:60%}@keyframes placeHolderShimmer{0%{background-position:-500px 0}to{background-position:500px 0}}
